snippet: Analysts cite trading blunders as the reason billions of dollars are flowing out of the stock market, but there might be a simpler reason: a lack of trust.
abstract: Analysts cite trading blunders as the reason billions of dollars are flowing out of the stock market, but there might be a simpler reason: a lack of trust.

headline.main: Why Are Investors Fleeing Equities? Hint: It's Not the Computers
headline.print_headline: Why Investors Flee Equities? Hint: It’s Not The Computers
